question: Is Rheumatoid Arthritis related to myopathy?
ideal_answer: Vacuolar myopathy and statin-induced myopathy have been reported in rheumatoid arthritis patients, but this association may be due to the anti-malarial treatment received. An increased prevalence of neurogenic but not myogenic changes in patients with RA compared with controls has been reported.
